results.name: The InVincible Iron Ivy: Enter the Pretty, Pretty Princess

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or similar)
  • Processor: 2 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or comparable grade of graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Players controllers should have enough buttons to accommodate all of the games features. Generally, the windows and XBox controllers work fine. Therefore, if your controller is comparable it should work fine, also.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or similar)
  • Processor: 4 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or high grade of graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Players controllers should have enough buttons to accommodate all of the games features. Generally, the windows and XBox controllers work fine. Therefore, if your controller is comparable it should work fine, also.
